alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln and north central Sanders Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 31 miles east of Noxon, or 31 miles southeast of Libby, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility from torrential rainfall could result in difficult driving conditions along Highway 2 around Happys Inn. Locations impacted include... Happys Inn. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 66 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
